text: My by blaspheming proty BOHA yakshcho b my pereyshly do vashoyi relihiyi pislya BOHA vryatuvaly nas z tse. Yak my mohly pereyty nazad do tse proty budemo BOHA nash Lord? Nashe znannya Lorda okhoplyuye vsi rechi. My postavyly nashu doviru u BOHU. Nash Lord, harantuyut聞 nam vyrishal聞nu peremohu nad nashymy lyud聞my. Vy yavlyayete soboyu krashchoho prykhyl聞nyka
